tasks.title: Complete Initial B1 Assessment
tasks.description: Take a comprehensive B1 level assessment to establish baseline metrics for all language skills
tasks.details: Complete a full B1 assessment covering grammar, vocabulary, reading, writing, listening, and speaking. Document scores for each section and identify specific weaknesses. Target score: 18/20 minimum to proceed to B2 content.
tasks.testStrategy: Use standardized B1 test format with sections for each skill. Record time taken for each section. Have results evaluated by French teacher or AI tool.

tasks.title: Set Up Daily Practice Routine Structure
tasks.description: Establish the daily practice routine with time blocks for each skill area
tasks.details: Create a sustainable daily practice schedule: Mon/Wed/Fri for grammar (45 min), Tue/Thu for vocabulary (30 min), Saturday for writing (1h30), Sunday for immersion. Set up reminders and tracking system.
tasks.testStrategy: Follow routine for one week and assess adherence. Adjust timing if needed.

tasks.title: Create Error Tracking System
tasks.description: Build a system to track persistent errors and monitor improvement
tasks.details: Design an error log to track: error type, frequency, context, correction, and date. Focus on SI clauses, pronoun order, and conjugation errors. Include review mechanism.
tasks.testStrategy: Log errors from assessment and first week of practice. Verify system captures key patterns.

tasks.title: Master SI + Conditional Clauses
tasks.description: Intensive remediation of SI clause usage - Kyle's critical weakness (Sera couvert dans le Chapitre 27)
tasks.details: Focus on correct formation: Si + present → future, Si + imparfait → conditionnel présent, Si + plus-que-parfait → conditionnel passé. Create mnemonic devices. Daily drills with 20+ examples.
tasks.testStrategy: Complete 100 SI clause exercises with 95% accuracy. No 'Si j'aurais' errors allowed.

tasks.title: Pronoun Order Mastery
tasks.description: Systematic training on COD/COI pronoun placement (Sera couvert dans le Chapitre 19)
tasks.details: Master pronoun order: me/te/se/nous/vous before le/la/les before lui/leur before y before en. Practice with affirmative, negative, and imperative forms. Focus on double pronoun constructions.
tasks.testStrategy: 50 pronoun placement exercises with 90% accuracy. Timed drills for automatic response.

tasks.title: Basic Conjugation Error Elimination
tasks.description: Fix persistent basic conjugation errors like 'je comprend'
tasks.details: Review present tense endings for all verb groups. Focus on -re verbs and irregular verbs. Daily conjugation drills, especially for high-frequency verbs.
tasks.testStrategy: Zero tolerance for basic conjugation errors in all written and spoken production.

tasks.title: Implement Daily Speaking Practice
tasks.description: Establish routine for daily oral production with recording and analysis
tasks.details: Daily 5-minute monologue on assigned topic. Record as MP3, transcribe, analyze errors. Use 20-point evaluation grid. Focus on fluency and grammar accuracy.
tasks.testStrategy: Complete 7 consecutive days of recordings with transcription and self-evaluation.

tasks.title: Idiomatic Expression Acquisition
tasks.description: Learn 5 idiomatic expressions daily to address vocabulary weakness
tasks.details: Study 5 expressions per day from '198 French Phrases' book. Create context sentences. Practice in speaking and writing. Focus on DELF B2 common topics.
tasks.testStrategy: Weekly quiz on 35 expressions with 80% retention rate.

tasks.title: Tense Concordance Training
tasks.description: Master tense agreement in complex sentences and reported speech (Sera couvert dans le Chapitre 28)
tasks.details: Study concordance rules for reported speech, time clauses, and hypothetical situations. Practice transforming direct to indirect speech. Focus on past tense sequences.
tasks.testStrategy: 30 concordance exercises with special focus on reported speech transformations.

tasks.title: Argumentative Writing Structure
tasks.description: Develop skills for B2-level argumentative essay writing
tasks.details: Learn introduction-development-conclusion structure. Practice thesis statements, linking words, and counter-arguments. Weekly 250-word essays on controversial topics.
tasks.testStrategy: Write 4 argumentative essays scoring 15/20 or higher on B2 criteria.

tasks.title: Film Immersion Without Subtitles
tasks.description: Develop listening comprehension through French films
tasks.details: Watch one French film weekly without subtitles. Take notes on plot, new expressions, and comprehension gaps. Discuss in speaking practice.
tasks.testStrategy: Summarize film plot with 80% accuracy. Identify 10+ new expressions per film.

tasks.title: Complex Oral Production Topics
tasks.description: Practice B2-level speaking topics with sophisticated arguments
tasks.details: Prepare 3-minute presentations on abstract topics: environment, technology, society. Use complex structures and varied vocabulary. Record and evaluate on 20-point scale.
tasks.testStrategy: Achieve 16/20 or higher on 5 different B2 oral topics.

tasks.title: Mock B2 Exam Practice
tasks.description: Complete full-length B2 practice exams under timed conditions
tasks.details: Take complete DELF B2 mock exams including all four skills. Time each section strictly. Analyze results and identify remaining weaknesses.
tasks.testStrategy: Score 18/20 or higher on two consecutive mock exams.

tasks.title: Speed and Fluency Optimization
tasks.description: Increase speaking and writing speed while maintaining accuracy
tasks.details: Timed exercises for rapid response. Speaking: 5-minute impromptu topics. Writing: 250 words in 30 minutes. Focus on automatic language production.
tasks.testStrategy: Speak 5 minutes without major hesitation. Write 250 words in 30 minutes with <5 errors.

tasks.title: Final B2 Preparation Strategy
tasks.description: Intensive review and final exam preparation
tasks.details: Review all persistent errors. Practice exam strategies. Mental preparation and stress management. Final mock exams with full conditions.
tasks.testStrategy: Consistent 18/20 or higher on all skill areas in practice exams.

tasks.title: Révision ciblée des faiblesses grammaticales et préparation DELF B2 blanc
tasks.description: Révision intensive des points grammaticaux faibles identifiés après completion du livre Grammaire Progressive Avancé, suivie de la préparation et réalisation d'un examen DELF B2 blanc complet.
tasks.details: Phase 1 - Révision ciblée des faiblesses : Identifier et lister les erreurs grammaticales persistantes malgré l'étude complète du livre (hors "Si + conditionnel" désormais maîtrisé). Créer des exercices spécifiques pour chaque faiblesse identifiée avec correction détaillée. Pratiquer intensivement ces points faibles avec des exercices variés jusqu'à maîtrise complète. Phase 2 - Préparation DELF B2 blanc : Réviser le format et les critères d'évaluation DELF B2. Créer des conditions d'examen réalistes avec chronométrage strict. Préparer des stratégies spécifiques pour chaque épreuve (compréhension orale/écrite, production orale/écrite). Phase 3 - Réalisation de l'examen blanc : Passer un DELF B2 blanc complet dans les conditions réelles d'examen. Analyser les résultats section par section et identifier les axes d'amélioration restants pour la préparation finale.
tasks.testStrategy: Phase 1 : Obtenir 18/20 minimum sur des exercices ciblés pour chaque faiblesse grammaticale identifiée, avec 3 séries d'exercices consécutives réussies. Phase 2 : Compléter une simulation complète de chaque épreuve DELF B2 avec stratégies définies et chronométrage respecté. Phase 3 : Obtenir un score global de 16/20 minimum au DELF B2 blanc, avec aucune section en dessous de 14/20, et analyse détaillée des points à améliorer documentée.
